text: Learning about Python JSON integration for web apps. It's interesting how we can use Python as a backend for storing data.
Working on integrating JSON with my PWA. The fetch API makes it easy to load external data files and display them dynamically.
Successfully added export functionality to my Learning Journal. Users can now download their reflections as JSON files for backup!
Comparing browser storage vs JSON file storage. Each has different use cases - localStorage for temporary data, JSON files for permanent records.
